scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web "dotnet watch run --project backend/src/StarterKit.Api --launch-profile StarterKit.Api" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.test: concurrently -n api,web "dotnet test backend" "npm --prefix frontend run test -- --run"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: dotnet test backend/tests/StarterKit.Api.Tests /p:CollectCoverage=true /p:CoverletOutputFormat=cobertura /p:CoverletOutput=../../TestResults/coverage/ /p:Threshold=80 /p:ThresholdType=line /p:ThresholdStat=total && dotnet test backend/tests/StarterKit.Api.Tests /p:CollectCoverage=true /p:Threshold=65 /p:ThresholdType=branch /p:ThresholdStat=total
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && dotnet build backend -c Release
